name: Filthy Dirty Witch Tower
description:
A short Bitsy game, made as a demo of scripting and exits for my class. Or, to be more accurate, it's the game I made as practice for the live demo, in class, with student input. Download it below and upload it into the Bitsy editor to poke around. Made with the Nothin' Fancy Tileset.

Use arrow keys to play.
